GET A VACCINE - Don't Wait! 

If you're in the cohorts that are currently being vaccinated, but can't get a local appt, you can get one for the 'super centres' by following this link. Our nearest is #Blackburn

#GetVaccinated #COVID19 #vaccine #DoIt
